title: Injury of muscles and tendons of unspecified body region
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Injuries to unspecified part of trunk, limb or body region
inclusion: Avulsion of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Cut of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Injury of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Laceration of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Sprain of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Strain of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
Traumatic rupture of muscle(s) NOS and tendon(s) NOS
exclusion: multiple injuries of tendons and muscles NOS
